item.title: Shilpa Pharma Lifesciences Clears USFDA Inspection at Raichur Unit-2
item.description:
<![CDATA[Shilpa Medicare Ltd filed that its 100% owned subsidiary – Shilpa Pharma Lifesciences Ltd has successfully passed the inspection by the US Food and Drug Administration (USFDA) at its Unit-2 facility located in Raichur.
The inspection was conducted from March 10 to March 14, 2025, and concluded without any Form 483 observations. It’s the second consecutive no-finding inspection at Unit-2, further reinforcing the company’s commitment to regulatory compliance.
No regulatory issues were raised by ...]]>
